summary: A restyled version of steel armor, that is even more nordic and comfy!
descriptionHtml:
[Center][b]RUSTIC STEEL ARMOR[/b][/center]

Information
--------------------------
This mod is a replacer for the light version of steel armor (the armor Lydia wears). The reason I made this is because the leg guards on the original model look really goofy. How I made this mod was by merging the steel and iron textures together, then I edited textures and added transparencies. I have actually spent weeks working on this mod and am pretty satisfied how it turned out. It works best with nord warrior characters that weld two handers, because one handers clip. I added an optional file that renames all the altered steel armors to \"Rustic Steel Armor\".

Future Plans:
High definition
Standalone
Male version

I am lazy and busy at the same time, so it may take a while to reach these plans.

Installation
--------------------
Just drop the data folder into the steam skyrim folder!

steam/steamapps/common/skyrim.

Folders should merge.
Uninstall by removing all files in your data folder that have the word \"rustic\" in it.

Programs used
--------------------
Nifskope
Photoshop
Creation Kit
Gimp

Bugs
------------------
Holes in the textures, I snuffed most of them out, but there may be a couple more
Clipping issues, depending on the weight of your character, it could a big clip or almost nonexistent.
Report anymore!

Special Thanks
Bestheda
QuickFox for basically teaching me 90% of the things I needed to know to make this mod :)
author: Feather Grey
